extension.title: Xbox Live Extensions
extension.label: Xbox Live
extension.description: This extension contains functions exposed by Xbox Live.

function.name: gamerCard
function.description: Embeds your gamer card in the wiki page.
function.param: Your Xbox Live gamer tag. It's your publically displayed name.
Define the css float for your gamer tag [left, right, none] (default: none)

function.name: avatar
function.description: Embeds a picture of your avatar for all to see!
function.param: Your Xbox Live gamer tag. It's your publically displayed name.
Define the css float for your gamer tag [left, right, none] (default: none)

div.eval:style: 'height: 300px; background: transparent url(http://avatar.xboxlive.com/avatar/' .. uri.encode(args.gamerTag) .. '/avatar-body.png) no-repeat top center;'
